title: Improve the generator slightly
body:
**Description of Change**

* Generator now preserves docs in generated files
* Generator now works on macOS

The macOS part is not super tested, but I was using Clang 17 from Xcode 26.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Related to #2348

comments.author: github-actions[bot]
comments.body:
**Triage Summary**  

Labels will be applied to indicate improvements to the generator related to the build process and support for macOS.

This issue is not a regression, as there are no mentions of compatibility concerns with previous versions or performance-related issues.

Additional remarks:
* The issue focuses on the generator's functionality, specifically for macOS, without suggesting past version problems or connections to backend labels.

<details>
<summary>Detailed Summary and Actions</summary>

Summary of the triage:

- The issue pertains to improvements in the generator, impacting the build process, especially regarding generated files and compatibility with macOS.
- The generator now functions properly on macOS, indicating relevance to operating system support.
- No concerns related to compatibility with previous versions, performance issues, or crashes were reported.
- There are no apparent connections to available backend labels regarding graphics APIs or file formats.

Summary of the actions that will be performed:

| Action      | Item          | Description                                                                                             |
| :---------- | :------------ | :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Apply Label | area/Build    | The issue pertains to improvements in the generator relating to the build process and generated files. |
| Apply Label | os/macOS      | The issue indicates that the generator now works on macOS, relevant to operating system compatibility.  |

</details>

_This entire triage process was automated by AI and mistakes may have been made. Please let us know so we can continue to improve._
